text: Host A want to send a file of 4,20,000 bits over a circuit switched network to another host B. Suppose all links in the network use TDM with 15 slots and have a bandwidth of 770 Kbps. Assume there is no circuit setup time. What will be the time taken by Host A to send a file of 4,20,000 bits to Host B (rounded off to 1 decimal place)?
